title: Fuck pes
content: Metro lines fucked getting no auto or cab and pes still wants to keep classes, they won't even answer calls and shit fuck pes

Guys, been a while since I graduated but i believe things have gotten worse. But it all starts to make become easy in the end, bunking is easier, so is the attendance strictness. 

Can someone fill me in on what's the worst internally, be it attendance, profs etc etc
